citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50pm on 11-
DEC-2023. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated that the licensee was working away from the facility for
the day.
End Section
